text: A Version of Now is the first solo studio album by Australian rock musician Peter Garrett, which was released in July 2016 on Sony Music Entertainment Australia. The album follows Garrett's retirement from Australian politics at the 2013 federal election. ==Track listing== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"| French Albums (SNEP) | 142 |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Albums (RMNZ) | 35 |- |} ==References== Category:2016 debut albums
title: A Version of Now
